summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Chart Studio and AI Insights features for DataViz Studio. Backend: 17/17 tests passed after fixing MongoDB ObjectId serialization bug. Frontend: All features working correctly - Chart Studio with live ECharts preview, dataset selection, chart type switching, chart saving, and AI Insights with GPT-5.2 integration.

fixed_this_iteration.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization error - 500 Internal Server Error
fixed_this_iteration.fix: Added {'_id': 0} projection to db.charts.find_one() query in server.py line 840

frontend: Charts page renders at /charts without errors
Chart Studio at /charts/new renders without errors
Dataset selection shows available datasets (Sales Data - 14 rows)
X-axis field selection works and generates live chart preview
Bar chart type selection and preview working
Line chart type selection and preview working
Pie chart type selection and preview working
Area chart type selection and preview working
Save Chart button saves chart and redirects to chart list
AI Insights page renders at /ai-insights without errors
AI Insights has dataset selector dropdown
AI responds with detailed analysis (GPT-5.2 integration working)

seed_data_available: Sales Data dataset with 14 rows, 5 columns (product, category, sales, units, region)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Chart Studio and AI Insights features working. Sales Data dataset available for testing. Test user credentials: test@dataviz.com/test123. MongoDB ObjectId serialization issue was fixed in /api/charts/{id}/data endpoint.
